\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[bcf231cc8b1069bbae1161662dd541fe]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={190}
\begin{aligned}
T_i &\sim Poisson(\lambda_i) \\
log(\lambda_i) &= \alpha_{c[i]} + \beta_{c[i]} log(P_i) \\
\alpha_c &\sim Normal(3, 0.5) \\ 
\beta_c &\sim Normal(0, 0.2) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[7f8ef66525074271e06d367009bf095f]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={224}
\begin{aligned}
T_i &\sim Poisson(\lambda_i) \\
\lambda_i &= \alpha P_i ^ \beta/\gamma \\
\alpha, \beta, \gamma &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\[%mdk-data-line={270}
\begin{pmatrix}
k_1 \\
k_2 \\
\vdots \\
k_{10}
\end{pmatrix} \sim 
MVNormal \left ( 
\begin{pmatrix}
0 \\
0 \\
\vdots \\
0
\end{pmatrix}, 
K
\right )

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[dee862468f0e3783c6a87f9ea9a36782]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={288}
K_{ij}  = \eta^2 exp(-\rho^2 D^2_{ij})
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[8e617013fe018d7d95945fd4ae3c29a4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={294}
\begin{aligned}
K_{ij}  &= \eta^2 exp(-\rho^2 D^2_{ij})  \\
\eta &\sim Exponential(2) \\
\rho &\sim Exponential(1/2) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={304}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1135dbf386203f18a4fb5fe7a40ce1d7]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={310}
\begin{aligned}
T_i &\sim Poisson(\lambda_i) \\
\lambda_i &= exp(k_{society[i]}) \alpha P_i ^ \beta / \gamma \\
\alpha, \beta, \gamma &\sim Exponential(1) \\
k_i &\sim \text{MV}Normal(0, K) \\
K_{ij}  &= \eta^2 exp(-\rho^2 D^2_{ij})  \\
\eta &\sim Exponential(2) \\
\rho &\sim Exponential(1/2) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={378}
